description: In what appears to be the first criminal case of its kind, two teenage boys were charged under a 2022 Florida law for allegedly creating AI-generated images depicting middle school classmates.
title: Florida Middle Schoolers Arrested for Allegedly Creating Deepfake Nudes of Classmates

description: An architect of the EU's tough new Digital Markets Acts says Apple would be a logical first candidate for investigation under the law, which aims to “break open” tech platforms.
title: Apple Could Be the First Target of Europe's Tough New Tech Law
